Name: Pengreens
About the game: Welcome to Penguinland Glacier! Join aboard the Pengreensâ„¢ Team! Here we deliver eletrical supplies along all the Glacier! Hop on and let's start to work! Travel along the glacier loading batteries and solar panels into delivery trucks, but be careful during your tasks! Solar panels are fragile and will break if you jump from too high with them! Batteries are more resistant, but heavier and will limit your jump abilities. Move between corridors of ice procedualy generated in each level, and avoid to break Carbon Crates to ensure energetic efficiency every level. Unlock every Carbon Credit possible on Penguinland Glacier by repairing all the Energy Windmills and finishing your deliveries within the time limit! Achieve a environment balanced Penguinland and restore it to its glory! Play along 25 levels crafted to use the most out of the block stacking mechanics. Chalenge yourself against the clock to get more credits on every level. Complete aditional chalenges in some levels to get more Carbon Credits. Be the change that will make Penguinland thrive!
